thread.title: Alston Laughlin
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by Alston Laughlin

author: Alston Laughlin
title: Alston Laughlin
text: I ordered 5 items and one has yet to be deiivered. My toes on both feet are curling under and the straps to hold 2 together is too short and there is no choce in sizes. Had no idea how to put on the gel toes separator. When I called for help NO ONE KNEW HOW TO TELL ME. All of these items are $2-3 more expensive than other places. SHOP before you buy.
